PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-13582018-11-01TC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Cargo, Fumigation and Tackle Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CARGO, FUMIGATION AND TACKLE REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that actual risks to public safety related to the loading and unloading of explosives at wharfs and ports are well identified and addressed, while allowing for increased commercial import and export activities; and (2) deal with minor issues that have arisen during the implementation of the Explosives Regulations, 2013, by adjusting or removing requirements that are not needed to protect public safety.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0233 Publication Date: 2018-11-14
AttachmentsAttachment
